text: This is one of the better articles on tech’s problem with women I’ve read, particularly the last 20% or so where they start to talk about solutions that actually show promise <https://www.theatlantic.com/magazine/archive/2017/04/why-is-silicon-valley-so-awful-to-women/517788/>

attachments.title: Why Is Silicon Valley So Awful to Women?
attachments.text: Tech companies are spending hundreds of millions of dollars to improve conditions for female employees. Here’s why not much has changed—and what might actually work.
attachments.fallback: The Atlantic: Why Is Silicon Valley So Awful to Women?
